title: UK interest rate vs house price index (cleaned)
source_provider: Bank of England - 'A millennium of macroeconomic data for the UK' (BoE Research Datasets)

variables.name: policy_rate_avg_pct
variables.description: Policy interest rate (annual average, percent). Extracted from BoE Millennium dataset Table A31.

variables.name: house_price_index_long_run
variables.description: UK house price index long-run (spliced) series. Extracted from BoE Millennium dataset Table A32.
variables.unit: index (as provided by BoE long-run series)

cleaning_steps: Read A31 and A32 sheets from BoE millennium spreadsheet.
Coerce year and values to numeric; drop rows with missing year or value.
Inner-join on year; keep years 1917–2016 inclusive.
Persist to CSV and SQLite; create index on year in SQLite.
